statements: SELECT * FROM ethics_committee_members;
SELECT member_name, email FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE role='Chairperson';
SELECT member_name, phone_number FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE member_id=2;
SELECT * FROM ethics_committee_members ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT role, COUNT(*) FROM ethics_committee_members GROUP BY role;
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE role = 'Chairperson' OR role = 'Secretary';
SELECT member_name, email FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT role, phone_number FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE role IN ('Chairperson', 'Member') ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT member_name, email, phone_number FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE member_id > 100 ORDER BY member_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ethics_committee_members;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM ethics_committee_members;
SELECT * FROM research_proposals;
SELECT proposal_title, researcher_name FROM research_proposals;
SELECT proposal_id, proposal_title, researcher_name, status FROM research_proposals;
SELECT * FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE member_role = 'Chairperson';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM ethics_committee_members ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, submission_date FROM research_proposals WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT proposal_title, researcher_name, submission_date FROM research_proposals WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE member_role = 'Member' AND member_name LIKE '%Doe%';

SELECT name, email FROM ethics_committee_members WHERE member_id = 1;

SELECT reviewer_id, rating FROM proposal_reviews WHERE proposal_id = 1;

SELECT title, description FROM research_proposals WHERE submitter_id = 3 ORDER BY proposal_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM proposal_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_id ASC;

SELECT member_name, role FROM EthicsCommitteeMembers ORDER BY role DESC;

SELECT proposal_id, review_date, comments FROM ProposalReviews ORDER BY review_date ASC;

SELECT proposal_title, submission_date FROM ResearchProposals ORDER BY submission_date DESC
SELECT r.proposal_title, m.member_name FROM ResearchProposals r JOIN EthicsCommitteeMembers m ON r.submitter_id = m.member_id
